channel.title: Server starts on a different IP
channel.description: I thought on 317's it will auto detect your IP and run it on this it runs a complete dif IP??? HELP!!!

item.title: Server starts on a different IP
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

SpectralX:

What if I want other to connect to my server will they be able to?

127.0.0.1 sets it up on your local host.
change it to WHATEVERYOURNAMEIS.no-ip.biz (<<–change to your no-ip) to get it so people can connect.

Read full topic
item.source: Server starts on a different IP

item.title: Server starts on a different IP
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

change the ip to 127.0.0.1 and the port to 43594.
then compile and run it again.

Read full topic
item.source: Server starts on a different IP

item.title: Server starts on a different IP
item.dc:creator: @SpectralX SpectralX
item.description:
@SpectralX wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:2, topic:432240”][quote author=SpectralX link=topic=534951.msg3910917#msg3910917 date=1328733934]
I thought on 317’s it will auto detect your IP and run it on this it runs a complete dif IP??? HELP!!!
[/quote]

LMFAO.

//you gotta change it in the client sided EGUI.java, and server sided Server.java. then compile it.[/quote]

  I look in Server.Java and there is only a way to change the port no ip?

Read full topic
